title: ParseNet: Looking Wider to See Better

excerpt: Abstract: We present a technique for adding global context to deep convolutional networks for semantic segmentation. The approach is simple, using the average feature for a layer to augment the features at each location. In addition, we study several idiosyncrasies of  ...
